short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents showing post-play suggestions on the end of episodes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your time to enjoy the credits and savor the moment after watching your favorite show or movie. With this extension, you can relax and enjoy without the screen being automatically pushed away.
